KEDO delegation leaves 
    Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Korean peninsula energy development organization left here today after participating in the high-level negotiations of experts between the DPRK and the KEDO for the implementation of the agreement on the provision of the light water reactors.
